languages.text: Каждый открытый участок кожи Ардженты испещрен затейливым узором из алых волдырей, багровых оттисков и сгоревших до угля тканей.

traits.locale_text: Каждый открытый участок кожи Ардженты испещрен затейливым узором из алых волдырей, багровых оттисков и сгоревших до угля тканей.

languages.text: Every exposed area of Argenta's skin is mottled with an intricate pattern of scarlet blisters, crimson indentations, and charred tissue.
languages.original_text: Каждый открытый участок кожи Ардженты испещрен затейливым узором из алых волдырей, багровых оттисков и сгоревших до угля тканей.

traits.locale_text: Every exposed area of Argenta's skin is mottled with an intricate pattern of crimson blisters, scarlet impressions and charred tissue.
Every exposed area of Argenta's skin is mottled with an intricate pattern of crimson blisters, scarlet impressions and charred tissue.
Every exposed area of Argenta's skin is mottled with an intricate pattern of scarlet blisters, crimson impressions, and charred tissue.
Every exposed area of Argenta's skin is mottled with an intricate pattern of scarlet blisters, crimson impressions, and charred tissue.
Every exposed area of Argenta's skin is mottled with an intricate pattern of scarlet blisters, crimson indentations, and charred tissue.
Every exposed area of Argenta's skin is mottled with an intricate pattern of scarlet blisters, crimson indentations, and charred tissue.

languages.text: La peau nue d'Argenta est marbrée par un mélange de cloques écarlates, de marques violacées et de brûlures.
languages.original_text: Every exposed area of Argenta's skin is mottled with an intricate pattern of scarlet blisters, crimson indentations, and charred tissue.

traits.locale_text: La peau nue d'Argenta est marbrée par un mélange de cloques écarlates, de marques violacées et de brûlures.

languages.text: 阿洁塔每一片暴露在外的皮肤区域，都布满了错综复杂的红色水泡、深红色印痕与烧焦的组织。
languages.original_text: Every exposed area of Argenta's skin is mottled with an intricate pattern of scarlet blisters, crimson indentations, and charred tissue.

traits.locale_text: 阿洁塔每一片暴露在外的皮肤区域，都布满了错综复杂的红色水泡、深红色印痕与烧焦的组织。

languages.text: アルジェンタの皮膚は露出している部分すべてに、緋色の水ぶくれ、真紅の傷跡、焦げた組織によって織りなされた複雑な模様が斑点状に広がっている。
languages.original_text: Every exposed area of Argenta's skin is mottled with an intricate pattern of scarlet blisters, crimson indentations, and charred tissue.

traits.locale_text: アルジェンタの皮膚は露出している部分すべてに、緋色の水ぶくれ、真紅の傷跡、焦げた組織によって織りなされた複雑な模様が斑点状に広がっている。

languages.text: Jeder sichtbare Bereich von Argentas Haut ist überzogen mit einem komplizierten Muster aus feuerroten Blasen, scharlachroten Vertiefungen und aufgeplatztem Gewebe.
languages.original_text: Every exposed area of Argenta's skin is mottled with an intricate pattern of scarlet blisters, crimson indentations, and charred tissue.

traits.locale_text: Jeder sichtbare Bereich von Argentas Haut ist überzogen mit einem komplizierten Muster aus feuerroten Blasen, scharlachroten Vertiefungen und aufgeplatztem Gewebe.

languages.text: Todas las zonas expuestas de la piel de Argenta están cubiertas por un intrincado estampado de ampollas enrojecidas, magulladuras escarlata y tejido carbonizado.
languages.original_text: Every exposed area of Argenta's skin is mottled with an intricate pattern of scarlet blisters, crimson indentations, and charred tissue.

traits.locale_text: Todas las zonas expuestas de la piel de Argenta están cubiertas por un intrincado estampado de ampollas enrojecidas, estigmas escarlata y tejido carbonizado.

languages.text: Argenta'nın cildinin açıkta kalan her bir yeri; kırmızı kabarcıklar, kızarmış çukurlar ve yanmış dokularla bezeli.
languages.original_text: Every exposed area of Argenta's skin is mottled with an intricate pattern of scarlet blisters, crimson indentations, and charred tissue.

traits.locale_text: Argenta'nın cildinin açıkta kalan her bir yeri; kırmızı kabarcıklar, kızarmış çukurlar ve yanmış dokularla bezeli.
